ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you!!!!... It s loyalty over greed, and we are not talking about VI, oh, did I forget to mention.. Get a fucking clue. loyalty over
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you!!!!...

It's loyalty over greed, and we are not talking about VI, oh, did I forget
to mention.. Get a fucking clue.
"loyalty" over "greed"....... ROFLMAO

-----Original Message-----
From: nara MKs [mailto:masterkiis_nara@...]
Sent: den 8 maj 2002 02:06
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation



Ooops...looks like i stepped on a few toes and rattled
a few nerves...was not my intention but rather
expressing my "frustrations" of the moment. Will be
sure not to do that again...and to whoever made the
comment about those who pay more SHOULD get the
perks...you are right and I humbly beg forgiveness for
valuing "loyalty" over "greed". Not all who play are
lucky enough to have bottomless BP's full of plat :-P

Amaiya


>I tried AO when it first came out. It was so laggy
> you really
> couldn't play. I gave it 6 weeks and saw only minor
> improvements.
> But the worst part were the missions all got boring.
> Go here, kill
> this, sometimes bring it back, oh sorry that mission
> is broken, you
> get nothing.
>
> And you think Verant customer service is bad! Read
> some of the AO
> sites. You can find them on most of the major EQ
> sites. These guys
> were terrible!
>
> I'll stick with EQ. No, I haven't seen a GM event
> in months, but on
> TT our GM's seem to be asleep at the wheel anyway.
> At least until
> Star Wars comes out...
>
